Sentencas: The status and progress of the anode materials for SOFC are reviewed in this paper.
Titulo: Progress on the anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) and its application for hydrogen production through high temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: The prospects, preparation, modification treatment, the relationship between microstructure and the property, the kinetic mechanism as well as the advantage and disadvantage of the currently developed anode materials are elucidated in details.
Titulo: Progress on the anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) and its application for hydrogen production through high temperature steam electrolysis

Sentencas: In particular, the potential developments and the application on the cathode of the high temperature steam electrolysis are put forward.
Titulo: Progress on the anode materials for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) and its application for hydrogen production through high temperature steam electrolysis
